{"id":1450561622,"question_id":6,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1731414743,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1450561622/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"13.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n    \n        if(numRows <= 1){\n            return s;\n        }\n\n        vector<string> v(numRows, \"\"); \n        int j=0, dir=-1;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++){\n\n            if(j==numRows-1 || j==0){\n                dir *= (-1); \n            }\n            \n            v[j] += s[i];\n            j += dir;\n        }\n\n        string res;\n        for(auto &it : v){\n            res += it;\n        }\n\n        return res;\n\n    }\n};\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
